name: Koopa Bros
description:
This is my FIRST GAME that pretty much ever made and released.

It's a fighting game and isn't too pretty, but I did work hard on it and am kinda proud of it. (Going to upload a DEV-log video on it soon to Youtube(Youtube.com/DimzNoms) I'll update this description when it is uploaded).

This game was only tested on Keyboard and Xbox controllers (other controller may work it just wasn't tested). CONTROLLERS PREFERRED FOR 3+ Players.

The game is free but if you would like to donation a $1 or $2 for my hard work. I would be VERY GRATEFUL! ( Donate: https://streamlabs.com/dimz_/tip )

[THERE MUST ALWAYS BE A Player1!]

There's a few combos and tricks you can do. So Experiment with holding a  few directions and inputting actions (and vise-versa). Example: Hold Up while doing Jab-Combo makes your ender a launcher.

CONTROLS FOR KEYBOARD:

Player1:

Movement: WASD.   Attack: Z   Shoot: X   Jump: C   Start: Q   Super: Z+X   Block: S

Player2:

Movement: ArrowKeys.   Attack: Nm1   Shoot: Nm2   Jump: Nm0   Start: Nm7  Super: Nm1+Nm2  Block: ArrowKey-Down

Player3:

Movement: TFGH   Attack: V   Shoot: B   Jump: N   Start: R   Super: V+B   Block: G

Player4:

Movement: IJKL   Attack: O   Shoot: P   Jump: 0   Start: U   Super: O+P   Block: K

CONTROLS FOR CONTROLLER:

Movement: Left-Joystick (Dpad for Menus)   

Attack: A/X   

Shoot: B/Circle   

Jump: X/Square  

Start: Start   

Super: Y/Triangle   

Block: Down on Joystick
